mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class ekshiksha.vclab.lab.WorkBench
This mouseListener is used to detect dragging motion of the mouse * @param me MouseEvent object The major action of this mouse Listener is to keep redrawing each equipment every instant as it is dragged across the Lab by changing the originShift coordinates of them to the getX() getY() coordinates of the mouse.

mouseMoved(MouseEvent) - Method in class ekshiksha.vclab.lab.VirtualChemLab
This method is implementation of the abstract method mouseMoved for MouseListener
mouseMoved(MouseEvent) - Method in class ekshiksha.vclab.lab.WorkBench
This Mouse Listener detects pure motion of the mouse without button clicks * @param me MouseEvent object The main purpose of this mouse Listener is to change the border color parameter of an equipment to red when the mouse is hovered within the equipment.
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class ekshiksha.vclab.lab.VirtualChemLab
 
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class ekshiksha.vclab.lab.WorkBench
This method extracts coordinates of where the mouse has been pressed

mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class ekshiksha.vclab.lab.WorkBench
This mouseListener detects a click and release of the mouse button

move(Activity, int) - Method in class ekshiksha.vclab.lab.Play_module
This function moves the given equipment from the initial point to the final point, it uses the repaint technique to create an animation effect.
